title: Self-adaptive vision-language model for 3D segmentation of pulmonary artery and vein
details: X Guo, D Yang, D Wang, H Zhao, Y Li, Z Sui, T Zhou… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2025
abstract: Accurate segmentation of pulmonary structures iscrucial in clinical diagnosis, disease study, and treatment planning. Significant progress has been made in deep learning-based segmentation techniques, but most require much labeled data for …
